p: The results of the quantitative analysis of formononetin and kaempferol in the extracts obtained by the two extraction methods from different Brazilian red propolis samples are presented in Table 4 and Fig 3. The chemical structures of the biomarkers formononetin and kaempferol are shown in Fig 4. The formononetin content ranged from 5.22±0.01 (D1) to 13.64±0.04 mg.g -1 (B2), whereas the kaempferol content ranged from 0.43±0.01 (A2) to 3.72±0.05 mg.g -1 (B1) among the extracts.
